title: Experience Boosts question
body: How can I tell how many experience boosts I have left? I cannot find it with this new client. I bought about 20 wins worth of exp boosts and I do not know how many I have left. (Do not tell me to check match history please)

replies.body: Heya, your amount of boosts will be visible in the profile pane of your client.  Select Profile, and mouse over the double arrow icon under your summoner name.  I've added a screenie, [here](https://i.imgur.com/rJflzqP.png)!  I hope that helps!
